hero.title: BAO Agent
hero.subtitle: AI-Powered Small Business Operations Platform
hero.description: Transform your manual, repetitive workflows into intelligent, scalable operations. We exponentially grow your business efficiency and bridge the generational knowledge gap between seasoned business owners and next-generation operators.

scheduling.title: Intelligent Customer Scheduling
scheduling.description: Our AI agent autonomously manages appointment booking across text, phone, and email channels. It learns customer preferences, sends proactive reminders, and optimizes scheduling to maximize revenue and reduce no-shows.

staffing.title: Smart Resource Optimization
staffing.description: Automatically coordinate personnel and equipment based on availability, location, and skill requirements. Our AI ensures optimal resource allocation while reducing scheduling conflicts and operational inefficiencies.

billing.title: Automated Revenue Collection
billing.description: Streamline your entire billing process from invoice generation to payment collection. Our AI handles multi-channel follow-ups, manages escalation protocols, and ensures consistent cash flow with minimal manual intervention.

analytics.title: Predictive Business Intelligence
analytics.description: Gain deep insights into customer behavior, revenue patterns, and operational efficiency. Our AI identifies growth opportunities, predicts trends, and provides actionable recommendations to drive strategic decision-making.
